name: 尤尚邦
objective:
課程內容包括：原理探討：超音波，磁場與磁性，電磁感應與渦電流，輻射線，液體表面現象，材料微結構；方法介紹：磁場檢測法，超音波檢測法，渦電流檢測法，X 光檢測法，液滲法，微奈米檢測 (各種顯微鏡) 等；材料非破壞檢測實驗：導電性材料、磁性材料、陶瓷材料、複合材料之缺陷檢測；結構非破壞檢測實驗：機械零件、以及特定結構之檢測；非破壞檢測影像：電腦數據擷取、數據分析、與影像處理
Introduce the concepts of following topics, Fundamentals: ultrasonic waves, magnetic field and magnetism, electromagnetic induction and eddy currents, X-rays, penetrants. NDT methods: ultrasonic testing, magnetoscopic inspections, eddy current testing, radiographic technique, penetrants method. NDT of materials: conductive materials, magnetic materials, ceramics, composite materials. NDT of structures: mechanical components, specific structures. NDT images: PC-based data acquisition, data analysis and image process.
schedule:
1.Introduction to non-destructive testing of materials and structures
2.NDT methods : Visual testing (VT)
3.NDT methods : magnetic particle testing (MT)
4.NDT methods : Penetrant testing (PT)
5.NDT methods : Radiographic testing (RT)
6.NDT methods : Ultrasonic testing (UT)
7.NDT methods : Eddy current
8.NDT of materials
9.NDT of structures
10.NDT of images
